channel.title: What's happening? Will Rep+ -SOLVED-

item.title: What's happening? Will Rep+ -SOLVED-
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

Okay so i’m trying to put this code in my shopassistant.java and I keep on getting 90 Errors… Here’s the code } else if (c.myShopId == 22) { if (c.pkPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { c.pkPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID); c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); c.getItems().resetItems(3823); } } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have enough Voting points to buy this item."); }

But I don’t get why i’m getting it since the code on top of it or below it doesn’t bring up any errors…Here it is.

[code] if (c.myShopId == 73) {
if (c.pkPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) {
if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){
c.pkPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID);
c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1);
c.getItems().resetItems(3823);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You do not have enough Rehab-P points to buy this item.”);
}

		}[/code]

If you guys could help I would be really grateful and will REP!

[center]UPDATE[/center]
I see what happened and got no errors gonna try it out…

[center]UPDATE[/center]
Okay I got it working

Read full topic
